description.@en: The Material Realm is made up of four classical elements. Manipulating ‘Chesed’, the green Ætheric wind, Elementalists are able to use the elements to their advantage. When melded together, they are a force that is both beautiful and destructive.

effect.@en: You can now attempt to learn Magicks from the Arcana of Elementalism. In addition, you automatically learn one Petty and one Lesser Magick spell from the Arcana of Elementalism. You cannot cast Lesser Magick from the Arcana of Elementalism until you have two Skill Ranks in Incantation. You can continue to learn Generalist Magick. Finally, you may only ever use Arcana of Elementalism and cannot adopt any other Profession that gives different Arcana types.
